org.apache.avalon.framework.component.Composable

Packages that use Composable
org.apache.avalon.framework.component Deprecated: use the interfaces in the org.apache.avalon.framework.service package instead.  
 

Uses of Composable in org.apache.avalon.framework.component
 

Subinterfaces of Composable in org.apache.avalon.framework.component
 interface Recomposable
          Deprecated. Deprecated with no replacement. The Recomposable interface is a legacy interface with no concrete contracts. Rather than copy the design mistake to the "service" package, we no longer support this class.
